entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 13. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Flurries at times heavy or snow squalls. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Flurries at times heavy and snow squalls beginning in the morning. Local blowing snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm except locally 10 cm in snow squalls. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 60 near noon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 32.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 32. Wind chill minus 20 in the evening and minus 45 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023
